channel.title: Changing The Color Of ::yell Please Help
channel.description: I have seen in quite a few games that when someone yells out the font color changes into green or blue. Does anyone know how to do that, or how to get me in contact with some1 that does. Thanks

item.title: Changing The Color Of ::yell Please Help
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

you would have to find the string that send message uses and change the color

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Color Of ::yell Please Help

item.title: Changing The Color Of ::yell Please Help
item.dc:creator: @HelpMePloxed HelpMePloxed
item.description:
@HelpMePloxed wrote:

Yes, But How?

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:165681”][quote author=8ballcrazy link=topic=224750.msg1938024#msg1938024 date=1197975344]
UHH…you need a custom client…
[/quote]
Actually, I’m not so sure you do. I believe there’s a packet you can send along with the text packet that can change the color of the text.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Color Of ::yell Please Help
